overview_of_class:
Proposed Topics

1. Bose-Einstein condensation (BEC) in an ideal gas

2. The weakly interacting Bose gas; the Bogoliubov transformation

3. Superfluid helium II

4. Microscopic interpretation of the Bose order parameter

5. Phenomenological theories of superconductivity

6. The BCS theory of superconductivity

7. Normal 3He and Fermi liquid theory

8. 3He: the first novel superfluid

9. BEC of photons, excitons, and magnons

10. Cold atom superfluids: theoretical background, cooling and trapping, representative results

11. Superfluidity in neutron stars
name: Quantum Fluids, Solids, and Gases
title: WCAS PHYSICS 434-0-1 Quantum Fluids, Solids, and Gases
